name: Florentine Cookies
author: Dawnsigkap
summary: Super easy Florentine cookies sandwiched with melted chocolate.
ingredients: 1 cup semisweet chocolate chips (such as Nestle® Toll House®)
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Line 2 cookie sheets with aluminum foil
Melt butter in a large saucepan
Remove from heat and mix in oats, sugar, flour, corn syrup, milk, vanilla, and salt until well combined
Drop by level teaspoonfuls 3 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets
Spread cookies out thin with a rubber spatula
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 5 to 7 minutes
Meanwhile, place chocolate chips in the top of a double boiler over simmering water
Stir frequently, scraping down the sides with a rubber spatula to avoid scorching, until chocolate is melted and smooth, about 5 minutes
Spread melted chocolate on 1/2 of the cookies
